long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to keep the ball away from the obstacles is to look ahead. If you pay attention, you will be able to see the next two or three sets of pipes. Prepare yourself, time the kicks perfectly, and keep that ball between the pipes! We are proud to say that our Flappy Ball game high score of 52 is unbeatable â€“ or is it?
